20110106024342.000|20110106024342.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110106024342.000|20110106024344.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110106024344.000|20110106024346.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110106024346.000|20110106024346.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110106024346.000|20110106024348.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110106024348.000|20110106024348.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110106024348.000|20110106024350.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110106024350.000|20110106024351.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110106024351.000|20110106024351.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110106024351.000|20110106024353.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110106024353.000|20110106024353.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110106024353.000|20110106024356.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110106024356.000|20110106024356.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110106024356.000|20110106024358.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110106024358.000|20110106024359.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110106024359.000|20110106024359.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110106024359.000|20110106024402.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110106024402.000|20110106024402.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110106024402.000|20110106024404.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110106024404.000|20110106024404.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110106024404.000|20110106024406.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110106024406.000|20110106024406.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110106024406.000|20110106024408.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110106024408.000|20110106024408.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110106024408.000|20110106024410.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110106024410.000|20110106024410.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110106024410.000|20110106024413.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110106024413.000|20110106024414.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110106024414.000|20110106024416.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110106024416.000|20110106024416.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110106024416.000|20110106024419.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110106024419.000|20110106024419.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110106024419.000|20110106024421.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110106024421.000|20110106024421.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110106024421.000|20110106024425.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20110106024425.000|20110106024425.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110106024425.000|20110106024426.000|CC1|        THERE'S COMPLETE.       
20110106024426.000|20110106024427.000|CC1| AND THEN THERE'S MOST COMPLETE.
